name: ingredient_search
description: Search for simple whole foods (e.g. fruits, vegetables, nuts, grains, meat, fish, dairy etc.).

query.description: The partial or full ingredient name.

addChildren.description: Whether to add children of found foods.

minProteinPercent.description: The minimum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

maxProteinPercent.description: The maximum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

minFatPercent.description: The minimum percentage of fat the food must have (between 0 and 100).

maxFatPercent.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food must have (between 0 and 100).

minCarbsPercent.description: The minimum percentage of carbs the food must have (between 0 and 100).

maxCarbsPercent.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food must have (between 0 and 100).

metaInformation.description: Whether to return more meta information about the ingredients.

intolerances.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All recipes returned must not contain ingredients that are not suitable for people with the intolerances entered. See a full list of supported intolerances.

sort.description: The strategy to sort recipes by. See a full list of supported sorting options.

sortDirection.description: The direction in which to sort. Must be either 'asc' (ascending) or 'desc' (descending).

offset.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 990).

number.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_ingredient_information
description: Use an ingredient id to get all available information about an ingredient, such as its image and supermarket aisle.

unit.description: The unit for the given amount.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: compute_ingredient_amount
description: Compute the amount you need of a certain ingredient for a certain nutritional goal. For example, how much pineapple do you have to eat to get 10 grams of protein?

nutrient.description: The target nutrient. See a list of supported nutrients.

target.description: The target number of the given nutrient.

unit.description: The unit for the given amount.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: convert_amounts
description: Convert amounts like '2 cups of flour to grams'.

ingredientName.description: The ingredient which you want to convert.

sourceAmount.description: The amount from which you want to convert, e.g. the 2.5 in '2.5 cups of flour to grams'.

sourceUnit.description: The unit from which you want to convert, e.g. the grams in '2.5 cups of flour to grams'. You can also use 'piece', e.g. '3.4 oz tomatoes to piece'.

targetUnit.description: The unit to which you want to convert, e.g. the grams in '2.5 cups of flour to grams'. You can also use 'piece', e.g. '3.4 oz tomatoes to piece'.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: parse_ingredients
description: Extract an ingredient from plain text.

ingredientList.description: The ingredient list of the recipe, one ingredient per line.

servings.description: The number of servings that you can make from the ingredients.

includeNutrition.description: Whether nutrition data should be added to correctly parsed ingredients.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: compute_glycemic_load
description: Retrieve the glycemic index for a list of ingredients and compute the individual and total glycemic load.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: autocomplete_ingredient_search
description: Autocomplete the entry of an ingredient.

query.description: The partial or full ingredient name.

number.description: The number of results to return (between 1 and 100).

metaInformation.description: Whether to return more meta information about the ingredients.

intolerances.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All recipes returned must not contain ingredients that are not suitable for people with the intolerances entered. See a full list of supported intolerances.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_ingredient_substitutes
description: Search for substitutes for a given ingredient.

ingredientName.description: The name of the ingredient you want to replace.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: get_ingredient_substitutes_by_id
description: Search for substitutes for a given ingredient.

id.description: The id of the ingredient you want substitutes for.

apiKey.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
